energy_swap_tips: Welcome to U-Shield Energy Flash Exchange 🔸 Transfer {energy_cost} TRX = 1 Time 🔸 Transfer {energy_cost_2x} TRX = 2 Times 🔸 Receiving address for flash exchange: {receiveAddress} ➖➖➖➖ Click to Copy ➖➖➖➖ Important Notes: 1.Each transfer is {energy_cost} TRX for one Energy unit. welcome_tips:
🛡️ U-Shield: Your Ultimate Protection for On-Chain Assets!
We focus not only on low-cost energy but also on transaction security!
Make every transfer safer and every on-chain interaction trustworthy!

🤖 Three Major Practical Features to Help You Manage On-Chain Assets Safely and Efficiently:
🔋 Tron Energy Exchange – Save over 80%!
🕵️ Address Risk Detection – Make every transfer more secure!
🚨 USDT Freeze Alert – Respond in seconds, keep your USDT forever unfrozen!

🎉 New User Benefits: One free address risk check per day!
address_check_tips:
Welcome to U-Shield Address Risk Detection
✅ Supports address queries on both TRON and ETH networks
✅ The system evaluates and analyzes based on on-chain behavior, risk labels, and associated entities

📊 Risk Level Description:
🟢 Low Risk (0–30): No suspicious transactions; not linked to known risky entities
🟡 Medium Risk (31–70): Limited high-risk interactions; unclear counterparties
🟠 High Risk (71–90): Frequent unusual transfers; potential ties to malicious addresses
🔴 Extreme Risk (91–100): Involvement in scams, sanctions, hacking, money laundering, or other high-risk activities

📌 Each user gets 1 free detection per day
📌 Additional detections cost {address_detection_cost} TRX or {address_detection_cost_usdt} USDT (TRX will be deducted first if available)

💰 Current Balance:

TRX: {tron_amount}

USDT: {amount}

Please enter the address you want to check 👇
daily_free_limit: Daily free limit reached. Top up to continue.
usdt_freeze_alert_tips:
Welcome to UShield USDT Freeze Alert Service

🛡️ UShield - Your On-Chain Asset Guardian!
Once an address is frozen by on-chain risk control, assets become extremely difficult to recover, leading to significant losses!
Hundreds of USDT wallet addresses are frozen and locked every day — the risk is real and ever-present!

✅ Ideal for users who:

Frequently send/receive payments

Have been exposed to sanctioned addresses

Have interacted with scam addresses

✅ Supports USDT wallet addresses on TRON/ETH networks

📌 Service Price (per address):

{server_trx_price} TRX / 30 days or {server_usdt_price} USDT / 30 days

🎯 Once activated, UShield provides 24/7 protection for your assets.
⏰ The system triggers an early warning mechanism before a freeze occurs, sending alerts every minute for 10 minutes, giving you ample time to move your assets.
📩 All alerts are delivered in real-time via Telegram.
freeze_alert_service_insufficient_balanc: Insufficient balance. Unable to enable freeze alert service.
secondary_contact_tips:
👥 Welcome to the Second Contact Service
To ensure real-time receipt of alert messages, you can bind a second contact Telegram account.
Before binding, please make sure the second contact has already interacted with this bot. After binding, this account will simultaneously receive alert notifications. To replace the second contact, simply repeat the binding steps—the system will update it automatically.
Please enter the @username of the second contact's Telegram account 👇
freeze_alert_service_monitoring_tips: 📌Keep sufficient balance for auto-renewal. Cancel anytime.
NAACUAMS: No addresses are currently under alert monitoring service.
transaction_plans_tips:
Welcome to the UShield Energy Package
One purchase, multiple addresses, one-click energy transfers

⚙️ Features
➕ Add addresses: Save up to 4 frequently used addresses
📍 Address list: Quickly send energy to your 4 saved addresses or any other address
⏳ Energy expires in 1 hour and will be automatically reclaimed if unused

tron_network_tips:
Notice: Temporary Suspension of TRON Network Deposit Services

Due to recent instability on the TRON network, some transactions may experience delays or failures. To ensure the safety of user assets, we have temporarily suspended deposit services on the TRON network. Services will resume once the network stabilizes.

✅ Other functions—including alerts, detection, and transaction packages—remain operational and unaffected.

Recommendation:
🔹 If you need to make a deposit, please wait at least 10 minutes before trying again.

We are closely monitoring the TRON network and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Thank you for your understanding.
